dialogueLines.line: I think we need to take the train to make it to the tournament.
dialogueLines.speaker: bf

dialogueLines.line: Looks like the next train is about to arrive.
dialogueLines.speaker: gf

dialogueLines.line: We're just waiting for the train.
dialogueLines.speaker: bf

dialogueLines.line: Say, I think that's the train right there. We should head over-
dialogueLines.speaker: gf

dialogueLines.line: You still owe me twenty bucks.
dialogueLines.speaker: pico

dialogueLines.line: Uh...I'll give it to you later.
dialogueLines.speaker: bf

dialogueLines.line: Hand me whatever you have in your wallet right now.
dialogueLines.speaker: pico

dialogueLines.line: I only have enough cash on me for the train ride.
dialogueLines.speaker: bf

dialogueLines.line: Say, isn't there another way we can settle this?
dialogueLines.speaker: gf

dialogueLines.line: You know, a certain way involving microphones and music?
dialogueLines.speaker: gf

dialogueLines.line: Fine, win a rap battle against me and I'll let you off the hook for now.
dialogueLines.speaker: pico

dialogueLines.line: But I get to use my gun.
dialogueLines.speaker: pico
